title: Miley Cyrus’s Naked Dress Has Over 50 Crystals - Shop the Trend Here
description: Miley Cyrus is no stranger when it comes to bringing her sartorial A-game and her latest outfit for the visual album, "Something Beautiful" rollout is clear proof. From a punk-rock leather ensemble from Chanel to going completely shirtless under a black pinstripe suit, the superstar is in her takeover era. Most recently, the superstar attended the Tribeca Film Festival in her boldest look yet - a naked dress. Brilliantly styled by her longtime stylist, Bradley Kenneth, the singer donned a net dress from Schiaparelli by Daniel Roseberry's spring/summer 2025 collection layered over a nude bodysuit. But it's not just any average sheer dress. The piece that perfectly depicts Cyrus's iconic renaissance, featured crystal embellishments all throughout, a plunging neckline, and a skirt made of off-white fringe fabric. in New York City, she opted for a SS25 Schiaparelli by Daniel Roseberry net dress. The plunging naked dress that was decorated with countless sparkly crystal embellishments. She also wore a matching fringe coat, a cream clutch, and cream pointed-toe heels. And of course, the artist's hair was no matter to gloss over; voluminous curls with a side part. The "Flowers" singer's latest outfit also speaks to the resurgence of the naked dress trend. Countless celebrities have rocked the silhouette throughout the years, with stars like Kylie Jenner and Doechii having worn sheer dresses as of late, from the Billboard Women in Music Awards to the Met Gala. And these stars prove the trend has graduated from your average see-through slip to more innovative designs - from cutouts with sheer overlays in full-coverage dresses to see-through catsuits. Of course, we've gathered some of the best sultry styles for every style, shape, and occasion that will help you nail the trend. Whether you're headed to a much-needed girls' night out or gathering looks for your bestie's tropical bachelorette, we have options just for you, even as low as $20. From an unconventional take on the LBD to sheer pants for your warm-weather evening soirées, shop our top sheer finds ahead.
author: Naomi Parris
excerpt: Try the Sheer Dress Trend With These Miley Cyrus-Inspired Styles

The lace is such a fun, yet classy detail, and the fact that it's under $26 makes us want it all the more.abercrombie.comBest Sheer TopAbercrombie & Fitch Draped Mesh Top ($27, originally $40) This bestselling top from Abercrombie & Fitch is a stylish layering piece you can easily wear for any occasion, especially a night out. From its slightly ruched bodice and asymmetrical hemline, this pick has a slim-fitting silhouette with a functional length.asos.comBest Cocktail Sheer DressAsos Design Shimmer Mesh Cup Detail Cami Dress ($55) This shimmery nude dress will absolutely stun everyone at your next cocktail outing. The silhouette already speaks volumes, but the necktie helps to elevate the look with an elegant touch, making it super versatile and promising for other occasions.outcast-clothing.usBest Sheer JumpsuitOutcast Aslan Jumpsuit ($71) If you're on the hunt for a piece that will command the room like no other, look no further than this berry jumpsuit from Outcast. Crafted with intricate floral detailing and playful long sleeves, this ensemble will ensure you're the center of attention. One with a bold print. We like this abstract take with sandals or heels. Its soft fabric and long sleeves make it the perfect spring-to-summer transitional piece. revolve.comBest Cutout Sheer DressSuperdown Elena Maxi Dress ($88) Innovative crochet details and embellishments have been all the rave since festival season started, and we're crushing hard on this piece from Superdown. Not only does it have the most captivating cutouts at the stomach and waists, but it also comes with sequin embellishments for versatile wear. We're also obsessed with the length, which is appropriate for every occasion from festivals to the "Cowboy Carter Tour."revolve.comBest Vacation Sheer DressGood American Gauze Mesh Maxi Dress ($132) Sheer dresses are a must have for vacations, and this one from Good American proves just that. The floral frock hugs your curves while giving you space to move around freely thanks to its breathable mesh fabric.nordstrom.comBest Sheer MinidressReformation Vina Sheer Overlay Minidress ($161, originally $248) In case you didn't know, sheer dresses don't have to be all-baring. You can tastefully nail the trend without showing too much skin with pieces that incorporate a sheer overlay, like this white minidress from Reformation. Whether you're a minimalist or looking for something that's not too revealing, this pick is perfect for you.danielleguiziony.comBest Bandeau Sheer TopGuizio Chiffon Wrap Around Top ($168)If you've been looking for a way to nail the sheer and bandeau trends with one piece, this chiffon top is it. The ruched bust panel effortlessly flows into a ruffle front that cascades into a splitting illusion. It also has a halter scarf neckline, making it versatile enough to wear with a flirty skirt or your favorite jeans. thefrankieshop.comBest Sheer PantsThe Frankie Shop Abra Sheer Trousers ($199) We love how the relaxed fit of these nude trousers and the side seam and back patch pockets make it super effortless, yet timeless. This is perfect for vacation or a casual day out in the city.Cristal RojasBest Editor-Approved Sheer DressOnarin Ms. Heart Bustier ($389) and Onarin Classic Fishtail Maxi Skirt ($259) While sheer dresses deliver the bare minimum in terms of coverage, sometimes they are worth the hefty price tag, like this Onarin two-piece skirt set. From the top's sheer bodice that hugs the waist perfectly to the skirt's flared hem, this piece is perfect for any night out. One PS editor wore the heart-adorned ensemble for her birthday dinner and felt super confident, which she details in her review of the Onarin Ms. Heart Bustier Skirt here.Editor Quote: "I was excited to deliver the shock factor; to bravely show off my curves when I hit the street the way celebrities do on the red carpet. Ultimately, I received compliments all night long on the Onarin naked dress, and I never for an instant felt too exposed or awkward." — Sarah Wasilak, associate content director, Shoppingrevolve.comBest Midi Sheer DressSiedres Nuina Dress ($451) Sheer can still be revealing yet classy. Such is the case with this butter yellow pick from Siedres. We love the slightly asymmetrical hem and back cutout. Whether you're going on a date or a cocktail event, this is a versatile option to have in your summer wardrobe.staud.clothingBest Sheer Wedding Guest DressStaud Calluna Dress ($495)If you're looking for a classic, sophisticated dress with a sultry element for your next summer wedding, this option from Staud is the ideal mix. We love how the slip doesn't run all the way down to the hem of the dress so it delivers the perfect balance of coverage and sheer. Plus, this blue rose fabric is too chic to resist, making it a subtle, head-turning moment.Naomi Parris is the assistant shopping editor at PS, based in New York. With over eight years of experience and previous roles held on the brand's Beauty and Operations teams, she enjoys telling stories that merge fashion, beauty, and Black culture. Naomi has also lent her skillful pen to Essence Girls United, Elle, Bustle, and Elite Daily. When she's not crafting shopping roundups, high-profile features, beauty op-eds, or trend guides, you can find Naomi behind her blog "Eli-Nay," where she inspires readers through style guides, cultural pieces, and innovative content on her Instagram.
html:
Skip to main content

While each product featured is independently selected by our editors, we may include paid promotion. If you buy something through our links, we may earn commission. Read more about our Product Review Guidelines here.

Miley Cyrus is no stranger when it comes to bringing her sartorial A-game and her latest outfit for the visual album, "Something Beautiful" rollout is clear proof. From a punk-rock leather ensemble from Chanel to going completely shirtless under a black pinstripe suit, the superstar is in her takeover era. Most recently, the superstar attended the Tribeca Film Festival in her boldest look yet — a naked dress. Brilliantly styled by her longtime stylist, Bradley Kenneth, the singer donned a net dress from Schiaparelli by Daniel Roseberry's spring/summer 2025 collection layered over a nude bodysuit. But it's not just any average sheer dress. The piece that perfectly depicts Cyrus's iconic renaissance, featured crystal embellishments all throughout, a plunging neckline, and a skirt made of off-white fringe fabric. in New York City, she opted for a SS25 Schiaparelli by Daniel Roseberry net dress. The plunging naked dress that was decorated with countless sparkly crystal embellishments. She also wore a matching fringe coat, a cream clutch, and cream pointed-toe heels. And of course, the artist's hair was no matter to gloss over; voluminous curls with a side part.

The "Flowers" singer's latest outfit also speaks to the resurgence of the naked dress trend. Countless celebrities have rocked the silhouette throughout the years, with stars like Kylie Jenner and Doechii having worn sheer dresses as of late, from the Billboard Women in Music Awards to the Met Gala. And these stars prove the trend has graduated from your average see-through slip to more innovative designs — from cutouts with sheer overlays in full-coverage dresses to see-through catsuits. Of course, we've gathered some of the best sultry styles for every style, shape, and occasion that will help you nail the trend.

Whether you're headed to a much-needed girls' night out or gathering looks for your bestie's tropical bachelorette, we have options just for you, even as low as $20. From an unconventional take on the LBD to sheer pants for your warm-weather evening soirées, shop our top sheer finds ahead.

Best Sheer Coverup

Nicoxijia Sheer Mesh Long Maxi Skirt ($20)

There's nothing like a vibrant print to elevate your beachwear. This floor-grazing cheetah skirt takes the sheer trend a step further with its airy, figure-flattering fit. Wear it with a neutral bikini top or with a tie-front top for dinner.

Best Affordable Sheer Dress

Nufiwi Vintage Y2K Lace Maxi Dress ($26)

Whether you're still stuck in Y2K's domination from a few years ago or you love lace clothing, consider this Amazon pick to meet your shopping needs. The lace is such a fun, yet classy detail, and the fact that it's under $26 makes us want it all the more.

Best Sheer Top

Abercrombie & Fitch Draped Mesh Top ($27, originally $40)

This bestselling top from Abercrombie & Fitch is a stylish layering piece you can easily wear for any occasion, especially a night out. From its slightly ruched bodice and asymmetrical hemline, this pick has a slim-fitting silhouette with a functional length.

Best Cocktail Sheer Dress

Asos Design Shimmer Mesh Cup Detail Cami Dress ($55)

This shimmery nude dress will absolutely stun everyone at your next cocktail outing. The silhouette already speaks volumes, but the necktie helps to elevate the look with an elegant touch, making it super versatile and promising for other occasions.

Best Sheer Jumpsuit

Outcast Aslan Jumpsuit ($71)

If you're on the hunt for a piece that will command the room like no other, look no further than this berry jumpsuit from Outcast. Crafted with intricate floral detailing and playful long sleeves, this ensemble will ensure you're the center of attention. Style it solo with heels for a bare-all moment or layer it under a sleek trench for a mysterious edge.

Best Plus Size Sheer Dress

Vero Moda Curve Long Sleeve Mesh Maxi Dress ($76)

The only thing better than a sheer dress? One with a bold print. We like this abstract take with sandals or heels. Its soft fabric and long sleeves make it the perfect spring-to-summer transitional piece.

Best Cutout Sheer Dress

Superdown Elena Maxi Dress ($88)

Innovative crochet details and embellishments have been all the rave since festival season started, and we're crushing hard on this piece from Superdown. Not only does it have the most captivating cutouts at the stomach and waists, but it also comes with sequin embellishments for versatile wear. We're also obsessed with the length, which is appropriate for every occasion from festivals to the "Cowboy Carter Tour."

Best Vacation Sheer Dress

Good American Gauze Mesh Maxi Dress ($132)

Sheer dresses are a must have for vacations, and this one from Good American proves just that. The floral frock hugs your curves while giving you space to move around freely thanks to its breathable mesh fabric.

Best Sheer Minidress

Reformation Vina Sheer Overlay Minidress ($161, originally $248)

In case you didn't know, sheer dresses don't have to be all-baring. You can tastefully nail the trend without showing too much skin with pieces that incorporate a sheer overlay, like this white minidress from Reformation. Whether you're a minimalist or looking for something that's not too revealing, this pick is perfect for you.

Best Bandeau Sheer Top

Guizio Chiffon Wrap Around Top ($168)

If you've been looking for a way to nail the sheer and bandeau trends with one piece, this chiffon top is it. The ruched bust panel effortlessly flows into a ruffle front that cascades into a splitting illusion. It also has a halter scarf neckline, making it versatile enough to wear with a flirty skirt or your favorite jeans.

Best Sheer Pants

The Frankie Shop Abra Sheer Trousers ($199)

We love how the relaxed fit of these nude trousers and the side seam and back patch pockets make it super effortless, yet timeless. This is perfect for vacation or a casual day out in the city.

Best Editor-Approved Sheer Dress

Onarin Ms. Heart Bustier ($389) and Onarin Classic Fishtail Maxi Skirt ($259)

While sheer dresses deliver the bare minimum in terms of coverage, sometimes they are worth the hefty price tag, like this Onarin two-piece skirt set. From the top's sheer bodice that hugs the waist perfectly to the skirt's flared hem, this piece is perfect for any night out. One PS editor wore the heart-adorned ensemble for her birthday dinner and felt super confident, which she details in her review of the Onarin Ms. Heart Bustier Skirt here.

Editor Quote: "I was excited to deliver the shock factor; to bravely show off my curves when I hit the street the way celebrities do on the red carpet. Ultimately, I received compliments all night long on the Onarin naked dress, and I never for an instant felt too exposed or awkward." — Sarah Wasilak, associate content director, Shopping

Best Midi Sheer Dress

Siedres Nuina Dress ($451)

Sheer can still be revealing yet classy. Such is the case with this butter yellow pick from Siedres. We love the slightly asymmetrical hem and back cutout. Whether you're going on a date or a cocktail event, this is a versatile option to have in your summer wardrobe.

Best Sheer Wedding Guest Dress

Staud Calluna Dress ($495)

If you're looking for a classic, sophisticated dress with a sultry element for your next summer wedding, this option from Staud is the ideal mix. We love how the slip doesn't run all the way down to the hem of the dress so it delivers the perfect balance of coverage and sheer. Plus, this blue rose fabric is too chic to resist, making it a subtle, head-turning moment.

Naomi Parris is the assistant shopping editor at PS, based in New York. With over eight years of experience and previous roles held on the brand's Beauty and Operations teams, she enjoys telling stories that merge fashion, beauty, and Black culture. Naomi has also lent her skillful pen to Essence Girls United, Elle, Bustle, and Elite Daily. When she's not crafting shopping roundups, high-profile features, beauty op-eds, or trend guides, you can find Naomi behind her blog "Eli-Nay," where she inspires readers through style guides, cultural pieces, and innovative content on her Instagram.
